li.a: NOTICE OF PUBLIC MEETING ON TAX RATE
Plemons-Stinnett-Phillips CISD District of Innovation Plan
Public Notice - HAC SSA Distriction of Records

img.style: width: 185px; margin-bottom: 5px; float: left; height: 190px; margin-right: 5px

span.span: In 1987 three great schools and communities, Plemons, Stinnett and Phillips joined forces to create the Plemons-Stinnett-Phillips Consolidated independent School District. Three mascots, the Plemons Indians, Stinnett Rattlers and the Phillips Blackhawks were blended together to create the Comanches. The campuses of the district, West Texas Elementary School, West Texas Middle School and West Texas High School are all united as Comanches.

div.class: custom_118141 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn
custom_147374 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

span.span: In response to the Covid-19 pandemic and to help ensure the health and safety of our staff, all campus offices will be closed beginning April 1, 2020. You may call to leave a voicemail and we will ensure your message reaches your child’s teacher or principal.
The PSPCISD Central office will be open from 10:00am to 2:00pm Monday thru Thursday.

div.class: custom_144674 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

span.font: Pick up Location is behind the West Texas Elementary School Cafeteria
All meals are free to children ages 1 to 18
Children do not have to attend PSPCISD to receive a meal
Please remain in your car, we will deliver the meals to your vehicle
Meal Delivery now available if you live outside the Stinnett City Limits
Call 806-878-4202 between the hours of 8:30am and 11:00am or email pat.lemery@region16.net

div.class: custom_118142 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn
div.p: We have implemented E-Notes Notification System to provide timely communication to parents, students, and staff members regarding campus and district news, activities, and classroom events such as projects, test or field trips.

If you have a child attending our District, you will receive phone notifications in emergency situations if your contact information is current at the school. In order to enhance our ability to accurately deliver information to you, we kindly request that you create your personal contact profile using E-Notes Notification Center.
Please click on the orange CONNECT button to set up and manage your account.

a.aria-label: E-Notes Notification Center does Text and Email signup now to choose activities and stay informed so connect now

img.class: img-responsive enote_portal_img_mbl visible-xs visible-sm hidden-md hidden-lg hidden-xl
img-responsive enote_portal_img hidden-xs hidden-sm visible-md visible-lg visible-xl

div.strong: School Closure or the remainder of the 2019-2020 School Year

div.p: Today, Governor Abbott issued an Executive Order closing school’s for the remainder of this school year. PSPCISD will continue to provide instructional support through technology and instructional packets.

span.span: Meal Delivery outside of Stinnett City Limits
